ygData.subject: Re: Forage and Sense heading (was Re: Sonorous Clouding message)
ygData.msgSnippet: The only thing I ve noticed is that rarely when I forage I ll get no item, and no failure message either. Perhaps those are the times when I m supposed to be
ygData.messageBody:
The only thing I've noticed is that rarely when I forage I'll get no item,
and no failure message either. Perhaps those are the times when I'm supposed
to be foraging something ELSE, but it is only half implemented? A friend of
mine said that he noticed this lack of message bug usually while in Greater
Faydark. (I had just thought it was a lag thing or some minor bug before.)



I have a druid, and I forage constantly with her. I have also noticed this,
but it happens at least once in every zone she goes to.

-Treehugger and Songmaker
